scripts.start-secure: HTTPS=true SSL_CRT_FILE=./.cert/cert.pem SSL_KEY_FILE=./.cert/key.pem REACT_APP_ENV=development react-scripts start
scripts.build:development: REACT_APP_ENV=development react-scripts build && rm -f build/service-worker.js && cp public/service-worker.js build/service-worker.js
scripts.build:dev: REACT_APP_ENV=dev react-scripts build && rm -f build/service-worker.js && cp public/service-worker.js build/service-worker.js
scripts.build:qa: REACT_APP_ENV=qa react-scripts build && rm -f build/service-worker.js && cp public/service-worker.js build/service-worker.js
scripts.build:rc: REACT_APP_ENV=rc react-scripts build && rm -f build/service-worker.js && cp public/service-worker.js build/service-worker.js
scripts.build:staging: REACT_APP_ENV=staging react-scripts build && rm -f build/service-worker.js && cp public/service-worker.js build/service-worker.js
scripts.build:production: REACT_APP_ENV=production react-scripts build && rm -f build/service-worker.js && cp public/service-worker.js build/service-worker.js
